column1: No. 23 of 1991 by the substitution for the definition of the expression “finance
company”, and “finance business” which read as follows:

column2: “finance company” means a company as defined in the Companies Act No. 17

shall be deemed to include for the purpose of any action that, may be taken
by  the  Board  or  the  Directors  under  this  Act.  Any  institution  within  the
the  Control  of  Finance  Companies  Act  No.  27  of  1979.
Notwithstanding that such institution has ceased to carry on finance, business

column1: on the day preceding the date of commencement of this Act”.
